tests.name: A: Output 1
tests.run: cd A; ./rude < test-files/test-1-in.txt > test-files/out.txt; diff -q test-files/test-1-out.txt test-files/out.txt >/dev/null

tests.name: A: Output 2
tests.run: cd A; ./rude < test-files/test-2-in.txt > test-files/out.txt; diff -q test-files/test-2-out.txt test-files/out.txt >/dev/null

tests.name: A: Output 3
tests.run: cd A; ./rude < test-files/test-3-in.txt > test-files/out.txt; diff -q test-files/test-3-out.txt test-files/out.txt >/dev/null

tests.name: A: Output 4
tests.run: cd A; ./rude < test-files/test-4-in.txt > test-files/out.txt; diff -q test-files/test-4-out.txt test-files/out.txt >/dev/null

tests.name: A: Output 5
tests.run: cd A; ./rude < test-files/test-5-in.txt > test-files/out.txt; diff -q test-files/test-5-out.txt test-files/out.txt >/dev/null

tests.name: B: Opens Pipe
tests.run: cd B; strace -e trace=pipe -o test-files/out.txt -f ./teetoo /dev/null ./greeter >/dev/null 2>&1; grep -qF "pipe(" test-files/out.txt

tests.name: B: Opens File
tests.run: cd B; strace -e trace=openat -o test-files/trace.txt -f ./teetoo test-files/out.txt ./greeter >/dev/null 2>&1; grep -F "openat" test-files/trace.txt | grep -F "test-files/out.txt" | grep -qF "O_WRONLY|O_CREAT|O_TRUNC"

tests.name: B: Fork-Exec 1
tests.run: cd B; strace -e trace=execve -o test-files/out.txt -f ./teetoo /dev/null ./greeter 3 10 >/dev/null 2>&1; grep -qF "[\"./greeter\", \"3\", \"10\"]" test-files/out.txt

tests.name: B: Fork-Exec 2
tests.run: cd B; strace -e trace=execve -o test-files/out.txt -f ./teetoo /dev/null ls >/dev/null 2>&1; grep -qF "[\"ls\"]" test-files/out.txt

tests.name: B: Output 1
tests.run: cd B; ./teetoo test-files/out.txt ./greeter 3 10 >test-files/stdout.txt 2>test-files/stderr.txt; ./greeter 3 10 >test-files/stdout_correct.txt 2>/dev/null; diff -q test-files/stdout_correct.txt test-files/stdout.txt && diff -q test-files/stdout_correct.txt test-files/out.txt && diff -q test-files/stderr_correct_1.txt test-files/stderr.txt

tests.name: B: Output 2
tests.run: cd B; ./teetoo test-files/out.txt ls >test-files/stdout.txt 2>test-files/stderr.txt; ls >test-files/stdout_correct.txt 2>/dev/null; diff test-files/stdout_correct.txt test-files/stdout.txt && diff test-files/stdout_correct.txt test-files/out.txt && diff test-files/stderr_correct_2.txt test-files/stderr.txt
